About Us

Nerdma (Pty) Ltd is an innovative Level 1 BBB-EE, IT Solutions company. We offer a wide range of IT solutions across the Southern Africa. We have a proud legacy of excellence and reliability that our clients, suppliers, staff and shareholders are proud of.

Our clients include multinational companies, listed corporates, small to medium entities, non-profit organisations and government departments. Nerdma has a highly skilled and dynamic team that, individually and collectively, has experience across a range of industries - Financial Services, Health, Agriculture, Manufacturing and Engineering. This experience makes us uniquely positioned to offer solutions that guarantee greater operational efficiency, productivity gains and cost savings for our clients.

Vision

To be the leading brand in ICT & technological innovation in Africa.

Mission

Our clients are the most important part of our organisation. We invest time and resources in understanding their needs and expectations by viewing situations from different vantage points. We pride ourselves in our ability to transcend limits, to think beyond!

Our processes are deliberately tailored to inculcate imagination and innovation which are the bedrock of our solutions. These solutions are delivered by a dedicated and well-trained team that interacts closely with clients throughout the project; from inception to delivery and beyond.

Values

  • Reliability
  • Innovation
  • Passion
  • Commitment
  • Interaction
  • Integrity

Our quality guarantee provides our clients with peace of mind fully aware that our solutions are reliable, robust and cost-effective.
